pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: erdOne can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors merge
bors r-
Canceled.

I think I'll add https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/116395-maths/topic/finite_dimensional.20and.20finite/near/411069786 in a follow up PR and the docstring of both lemmas and undergrad.yml should all point there.
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Can you add a reference to the version for domains to the docstring of [rank_range_add_rank_ker](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/LinearAlgebra/Dimension/DivisionRing.html#rank_range_add_rank_ker)?

Also I think this (or the version over a field) should be added to https://leanprover-community.github.io/undergrad.html and https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib-overview.html

Thanks!!

bors d+

Can you please add a description of the PR?

Thanks!

Can you add a reference to the version for domains to the docstring of [rank_range_add_rank_ker](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/LinearAlgebra/Dimension/DivisionRing.html#rank_range_add_rank_ker)?

Also I think this (or the version over a field) should be added to https://leanprover-community.github.io/undergrad.html and https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib-overview.html

Thanks!!

bors d+

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion M'.toLocalizedQuotient' S p f (Submodule.Quotient.mk x) = Submodule.Quotient.mk (f x) := rfl ```
Is there a reason all variables are implicit here?
Can you add here a brief description of the file?
Here I think `b` should be explicit.

```suggestion
theorem finrank_span_set_eq_card {s : Set M} [Fintype s] (hs : LinearIndependent R (() : s  M)) :
```
Feel free to keep it explicit if you think it is better.

Same below.
Can you add a docstring here? Thanks!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Rank-nullity theorem for commutative domains
